index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to housing, authorizing agreements for an acceptance of financial assistance from the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development for the 1987 Rental Rehabilitation Program, authorizing implementation of rental housing rehabilitation projects by the Department of Community Development; making an appropriation from the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund therefor and establishing a repayment account in said fund; and authorizing the Mayor of his designee to enter into any necessary implementing agreements.
